items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / UI Components

*   [vue-calendar (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/Kodeglot/vue-calendar) - A fully-featured, customizable calendar date picker component for Vue 3 with built-in Tailwind CSS support. Perfect for building scheduling applications, event calendars, and date pickers.
items.content_html:
Components & Libraries / UI Components

  • vue-calendar (‚≠ê2) - A fully-featured, customizable calendar date picker component for Vue 3 with built-in Tailwind CSS support. Perfect for building scheduling applications, event calendars, and date pickers.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Community

*   [made with angular (‚≠ê101)](https://github.com/madewithangular/madewithangular.github.io) - A showcase of web apps built with Angular.

### Mixed utilities / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [fireng (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/BhanukaDev/fireng) - A collection of Angular libraries to simplify responsive development using signals.

### Scroll / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-scrolltop (‚≠ê30)](https://github.com/bartholomej/ngx-scrolltop) - Lightweight, Material Design inspired button for scroll-to-top of the page. No dependencies.

### Tailwind CSS Based / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [tailwind-ng (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/william-mba/tailwind-ng) - An open source UI components library that aims to provide a seamless and robust integration of Tailwind CSS components with Angular to make building a great UI easier and joyful at any scale.
items.content_html:
Community

  • made with angular (‚≠ê101) - A showcase of web apps built with Angular.

Mixed utilities / Google Developer Experts

  • fireng (‚≠ê2) - A collection of Angular libraries to simplify responsive development using signals.

Scroll / Google Developer Experts

Tailwind CSS Based / Google Developer Experts

  • tailwind-ng (‚≠ê12) - An open source UI components library that aims to provide a seamless and robust integration of Tailwind CSS components with Angular to make building a great UI easier and joyful at any scale.

items.title: Awesome Azure Openai Llm
items.content_text:
